用B细胞的能力增强肿瘤浸润淋巴细胞疗法莫菲特癌症中心的研究人员发现，利用人体自身的免疫系统并激活一种称为B细胞的免疫细胞，可能是提高肿瘤浸润淋巴细胞或TIL治疗的有效性的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/boosting-tumor-infiltrating-lymphocyte-therapy-therapy-with-with-the-power-b-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/boosting-tumor-infiltrating-lymphocyte-therapy-therapy-with-pow the-power-b-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3Be973Ae-310f-42b9-Afb3-A18D067B4066 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 21:23:57 -0400 Boosting tumor-infiltrating lymphocyte therapy with the power of B cells
解码绿色生物技术藻酸盐的酶促分解每年，从海床上提取数千吨的棕色藻类，以获取诸如藻酸盐之类的化合物，藻酸盐是由具有高密度和强度的糖组成的聚合物，提供了潜在的生物技术应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/decoding-the-the-enzymatic-breakdown-for-alginates-for-green-boiotechnology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/decoding-the-the-enzymatic-breakdown-for--alginates-for-green-boiotechnology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73d88E9F-0F03-4604-4604-84cc-1C093A30493 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 21:17:52 -0400
了解Castleman病的复杂频谱Castleman疾病（CD）是一种罕见的，非克隆的淋巴增生性疾病，具有广泛的组织学和临床特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/understanding-the-complex-spectrum-of-castleman-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/understanding-the-complex-spectrum-of-castleman-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e9Feb2E-8945-4A2B-B2A3-8ECC12371794 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 21:13:26 -0400 Understanding the complex spectrum of Castleman disease
通过颜色特征设计用于遥感的细菌可以设计细菌以感知各种分子，例如污染物或土壤养分。但是，在大多数情况下，只能通过在显微镜或类似敏感的实验室设备下查看细胞来检测这些信号，从而使它们不切实际地用于大规模使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/bacteria-eentine-for-for-remote-sensing-through-color-signatures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/bacteria-eendineered-for-remote-sensing-through-color-signatures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9621161a-3313-4186-9c7a-971cb958c6c9 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 21:05:18 -0400 Bacteria engineered for remote sensing through color signatures
COVID-19治疗显示最小的严重副作用在过去的四年中，美国食品药品监督管理局批准了Covid-19的许多治疗选择，包括抗病毒药物和单克隆抗体，这些抗体抑制了过度的免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/covid-19-treatments-show-minimal-serious-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/covid-19-treatments-show-minimal-serious-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b43968a-a1af-40b7-957c-ed340d9c4990 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 12:40:00 -0400 COVID-19 treatments show minimal serious side effects

虚拟现实触觉模拟器提高技能并减轻牙齿训练的压力根据《国际牙髓杂志》上发表的一项新研究，使用虚拟现实触觉模拟器可以增强牙科学生的技能获取并减轻牙科学生的压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/virtual-reality-haptic-simulators-boost-skills-skills-skills-and-reduce sursstrast-in-dental-in-dental-training.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/Virtual-reality-haptic-simulators-boost-skills-and-reduce-stress-in-dental-training.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c80ebd9d-c32d-4cb4-b407-e3e3e3dc12a552 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 12:09:42 -0400 Virtual reality haptic simulators boost skills and reduce stress in dental training
